member.summary: Source interface used for implementing data source for migration. Migration framework uses GetAsync method to get data and pass it on to destination consumer.

member.summary: Prepares the source before the migration called by the framework.
member.remarks: Use this to do one time activity for migration.
member.param: A parameters passed from the data migration.
member.returns: The object representing the async operation.

member.name: M:DataMigrationFramework.ISource`1.ProduceAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Produces the items to be used by the destination.
member.remarks: Framework uses this method to send data to destination. Framework stops calling this method once it returns empty list.
member.param: Size of the items to be produced for each call by the producer. Used to limit the resource during the run.
member.returns: The object representing the asynchronous operation. The property returns the list of model objects.

member.name: M:DataMigrationFramework.ISource`1.CleanupAsync(DataMigrationFramework.Model.MigrationStatus)
member.remarks: Called by the framework when migration is done one time. Use this method to do any cleanup operation.
member.returns: The object representing the asynchronous operation.
